dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 0088872-250525065834625
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is Carabidae", "Geometry POLYGON ((-83.57950000000001 35.5218, -83.3995 35.5218, -83.3995 35.701800000000006, -83.57950000000001 35.701800000000006, -83.57950000000001 35.5218))", "HasCoordinate is true", "Year is one of (2016, 2017)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 62 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 180 records from Essig Museum of Entomology 293 records from NEON Biorepository Carabid Collection (Pinned Vouchers) 70 records from NEON Biorepository Carabid Collection (Trap Sorting) 65 records from NEON Domain Carabid Teaching Collection 86 records from NEON Biorepository Carabid Collection (Archive Pooling) 5 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 41 records from NEON Biorepository Carabid Collection (DNA Extracts)
